column3: Name: “Table 1 of 1 on page 110 of 124”
Table: 102
Capital Improvement Plan
Contingency List
DESCRIPTION
Continuation of the Commander Sheppard Boulevard
Extension from the intersection with North Campus Parkway
to the intersection with Big Bethel Road and Saunders Road.
Addition of a traffic signal at the Hampton Roads Center
North Campus.
Replace damaged curbs, sidewalks and eliminate unused
aprons from city owned properties.
Widen Little Back River Road from King Street to Clemwood
Parkway. The widened section will be a four-lane divided
roadway. The requested funding is for design and right-of-
way acquisition. Additional funds will be needed for
construction of Phase 2 (construction from Clemwood
Parkway to Harris Creek Road.)
New street connecting the Pasture Point and Bright's Creek
areas.
The addition of pavement width to accommodate left turn
lanes on eastbound and westbound Pembroke Avenue. A
new mast arm traffic signal and pedestrian signals will be
constructed.
Install a safety fence on the bridge crossing Interstate I-64.
New street connecting the ramp from I-64 to King Street.
Connect Wine Street through to the proposed Honor Park
and to Pembroke Ave.
TOTAL: Streets and Infrastructure
TOTAL CONTINGENCY LIST
